sources.name: UTPointsOfDiversion
sources.script:
source(output(
		WRCHEX as string,
		POD_TYPE as string,
		NS_DIRECTION as string,
		NS_DISTANCE as string,
		EW_DIRECTION as string,
		EW_DISTANCE as string,
		SECTION_CORNER as string,
		STR as string,
		DIVERTING_WORKS as string,
		POD_COMMENT as string,
		WELL_DIAMETER as string,
		WELL_DEPTH1 as string,
		WELL_DEPTH2 as string,
		WELL_YEAR_DRILLED as string,
		WELL_LOG as string,
		WIN as string,
		X_UTM as string,
		Y_UTM as string,
		ELEVATION as string,
		recordId as string,
		MANUAL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTPointsOfDiversion

sources.name: UTConvertedPoints
sources.script:
source(output(
		XCoord as string,
		YCoord as string,
		Latitude as string,
		Longitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTConvertedPoints

sinks.name: NormalizedSites
sinks.script:
SelectJoined sink(input(
		SiteUUID as string,
		SiteNativeID as string,
		SiteName as string,
		USGSSiteID as string,
		SiteTypeCV as string,
		Longitude as string,
		Latitude as string,
		Geometry as string,
		CoordinateMethodCV as string,
		CoordinateAccuracy as string,
		GNISCodeCV as string,
		EPSGCodeCV as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	partitionFileNames:['sites.csv']) ~> NormalizedSites

transformations.name: DerivedPointsOfDiversion
transformations.script:
UTPointsOfDiversion derive(SiteUUID = 'UT_' + WRCHEX,
		SiteNativeID = WRCHEX,
		SiteName = 'UT_' + WRCHEX,
		USGSSiteID = '',
		SiteTypeCV = case(POD_TYPE == '', ''
    ,POD_TYPE == 'A', 'UT_A'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'C', 'UT_CFNP'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'D', 'UT_D'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'F', 'UT_CFNP'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'G', 'Spring'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'N', 'UT_CFNP'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'P', 'UT_CFNP'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'R', 'UT_R'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'S', 'UT_S'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'T', 'UT_T'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'U', 'UT_U'),
		Geometry = '',
		CoordinateMethodCV = 'GPS',
		CoordinateAccuracy = '',
		GNISCodeCV = '',
		EPSGCodeCV = 'EPSG4326') ~> DerivedPointsOfDiversion

transformations.name: SelectPointsOfDiversion
transformations.script:
DerivedPointsOfDiversion select(mapColumn(
		SiteUUID,
		SiteNativeID,
		SiteName,
		USGSSiteID,
		SiteTypeCV,
		Geometry,
		CoordinateMethodCV,
		CoordinateAccuracy,
		GNISCodeCV,
		EPSGCodeCV,
		XCoord = X_UTM,
		YCoord = Y_UTM
	))~> SelectPointsOfDiversion

transformations.name: JoinConvertedPoints
transformations.script:
SelectPointsOfDiversion, UTConvertedPoints join(SelectPointsOfDiversion@XCoord == UTConvertedPoints@XCoord
	&& SelectPointsOfDiversion@YCoord == UTConvertedPoints@YCoord,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinConvertedPoints

transformations.name: SelectJoined
transformations.script:
JoinConvertedPoints select(mapColumn(
		SiteUUID,
		SiteNativeID,
		SiteName,
		USGSSiteID,
		SiteTypeCV,
		Geometry,
		CoordinateMethodCV,
		CoordinateAccuracy,
		GNISCodeCV,
		EPSGCodeCV,
		Latitude,
		Longitude
	))~> SelectJoined
